title: [LFM]- (qVp)Looking for Diamond+ Support
body:
[](http://i.imgur.com/9HU32rp.png)

**Team: *Quiet Vacuum Pumps***

We are a serious team playing competitively. We are wanting to attend most of the LANs that will be available and also play competitively online. We just got our ranked 5s team to diamond 5 and are currently looking to solidify a main five to move forward.

Our team has been together for a while. During this time we have had high placings at LAN events, whilst also winning online tournaments. We are a great group of friends that enjoy playing with each other while also helping each other get better. 


**What we're looking for:**
- Must be 17+
- Live in Victoria
- Be available most nights
- Have Skype
- Diamond +
- Be mature and sociable
- Be able to handle criticism.
- Be able to listen and act accordingly. 


**Current Line Up:**
Top: FlexRainZ
Jungle: Chennyg
Mid: Zico
Adc: Wije
Support: 
Subs: Inevitable, iennie


**To apply just reply to this thread with:**
- Name
- Age
- Rank
- Champion pool
- Availability
- Play style
- Anything else you would like to add


**Thanks for reading, we are excited to see what you guys bring to the table!**[](http://i.imgur.com/9HU32rp.png)

replies.body:
- Name: Excerion
- Age: 24
- Rank: D5
- Champion pool: Pretty much the entire support pool but I main Thresh/Nami/Morg/Janna. I've been pretty much only playing Janna and Thresh since the end of the season unless banned and or picked. 
- Availability: Pretty much all the time.
- Play style: Aggressive and Objective based. Lane phase I like aggressive (and smart) trading. I also tend to roam after first back to deep ward so I like an adc that knows where I'm going and doesn't get caught 1v2.
- Anything else you would like to add: I'm not the strongest shot caller but I do feel like I bring constant vision to the team that allows for safer calls. I have been working on my warding and find myself constantly out warding the enemy support by 10-20 wards. I'm a pretty easy person to get along with and do take practice seriously, while at the same time not being someone who will snap at people making mistakes.

- Name Rhys
- Age 22
- Rank P4 on NA IGN Raguru, casual with friends on OCE S2 IGN Sins of Asura
- Champion pool Diverse palate. High CC or mobility champs are my most common as well as long range seige.
- Availability Most nights, except Saturday night after 3pm.
- Play style Calculated aggression.
- Anything else you would like to add Flexible player but would be most interested in playing mid, but will Jungle, Support or Top also.

Name: Mervyn Riley
Location: Brisbane Australia
Age: 18 
Rank: plat 5, kinda lost my drive to climb during pre season I will be climbing next season to diamond.
Champion pool: Nami, Leona, Janna, Sona, Morgana. I play all supports but the ones listed are my best. 
Availability: Anytime
Play style: Safe with calculated aggression 

I've played in a bunch of other teams, played on Synergize Gaming where I made it to semi finals during the first OCE opens tournament at the EB expo but got wrekt by Immunity. Had fun and would love to try out. <3.

- Name Esardo
- Age 16 but turning 17 in a couple of months
- Rank plat 5
- Champion pool; thresh, leona, pretty much any support lol
- Availability after 7 most days except for thurs, and weekends depends but usually on
- Play style aggressive, i talk a lot cause i believe in comms
- Anything else you would like to add, pretty experienced in ranked 5s so i know my stuff, i might not be 17 as of yet so if you dont accept thats understandable :)

- Name Ben White
- Age 12
- Rank Silver 4
- Champion pool: Nunu, Urgot, Irelia, Deathwing
- Availability: Non-school nites
- Play style: Mouse and Keyboard
- Anything else you would like to add: I also play habbo hotel

Sorry, we're looking for someone over the age of 17 :/
Thanks for the application though
I'd wrek you 1v1, im best support on eart.

- Name: Tom - Navi
- Age: 17
- Rank:  Diamond 5
- Champion pool: Regarding support - Thresh, Nami, Braum, Karma, Leona, Morgana, Janna, Alistar
- Availability: Monday - Friday after 5~6pm, Weekends whenever
- Play style: Usually safe with calculated aggression or at will. No stupid %%%% 
- Additional Info: Regularly play in ranked 5's and played in about a dozen tournaments during my 3 years of time playing League
Thanks for the reply :) I'll add you in game and we can discuss further

N: Clever Girl

A: 24

Rank: D5! I was climbin' and climbin' last season, but exams are more important than League. Played enough to get a shiny border and badge, though!

Pool: I've always loved aggressive supports. I made it to platinum playing support Poppy nearly exclusively! From there I ended up transitioning to all-in supports like Leona who could win lane at level 3, then to safer, peel-heavy multi-role supports like Alistar in Diamond when the skill levels started to equalize and I had to be more flexible with how I played. Alistar would probably be my go-to since he can initiate, peel, punish, and roam with the flow of the game, though I can play champions like Leona to roll a lane or Nami/Lulu for more fragile bully lanes. I'm still working on my Thresh, he's my weakest, but we'll get there!

Availability: U N I ' S O V E R B O Y S! I don't have a Christmas job, so whenever, zzz

Play Style: Aggression wins games! Hit 2, all-in, scare the pants off your opponents and draw jungle and top attention, spam laugh and avoid ganks, snowball the game with presence. I don't like playing from behind, but that's why I switched to champions like Alistar who are still very useful even then.

Anything Else?: Solo queue is fun, but I want to learn and play in a team environment. It's more fun, and hey, prestige!
Thanks for the reply :) I'll add you in game and we can discuss further

- Name: Gagi 4 M (Changing soon)
- Age: 19
- Rank: Peaked at diamond 4 then decayed from that to p2. But made it to diamond just before season end.
- Champion pool: (Kha'Zix, J4, Shaco, Vi, Warwick, Maokai, Eve - Jungle) (Mid - Orianna, Xerath, Malz, Ahri, Katerina) (Top - Maokai, Panth, Jayce) (ADC - Corki, Cait, Ezreal)
- Availability: I don't go to school and i don't work currently so any hour is available to me.
- Play style: I do not have a particular play style but i do like to adapt to the teams play style quickly as i am a fast learner and confident player. I can be a great asset to the team as i will try my very best to meet to your standards.
- Anything else you would like to add: Been playing league for a very long time, since 2010. I know all champion mechanics and every champions ability, i already know what it takes to be a solo que player. But i'm ready to be a team player now. :)

Sorry, we're looking mostly for a support and you don't see to play too much of it :/
Thank you for the application though

Sorry, we're looking for someone over the age of 17 :/
Thanks for the application though
